Data Analyst Roles: Junior/senior data analyst, business intelligence analyst, business/conversion/product/etc data analyst
Data Scientist Roles: Junior/senior/lead/etc data scientist, NLP/conversion analytics/product/etc data scientist

Notes:
4s across the board if at big, older company; 

MM -I'd rate this a 1 for DEs, I don't know anyone who uses it
Includes descriptive stats like mean/median/mode/variance/standard deviation, t-tests, chi squared test, regression

This can be in a past job, or in personal projects. Classwork is a good start but not enough. Having personal projects (including class projects, plus additional ones) is worth almost as much as equivalent paid work experience, bc it shows passion.
